hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="FD-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start rsyslog2-jessie-small-metacloud /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb3.metacentrum.cz/puppet-fdistdump.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ############
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh fdistdump-dev.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh fdistdump/bin/build.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh fdistdump/tests/fdistdump-singlenode.sh'
